name: Hellium Hopes
description:
A small arcade style game made for the Games Wales Jam 2015. This is a slightly updated version from the jam (adding some usability, polish and balance).

Follow the journey of a helium balloon trying to escape well. Its path up ahead is rocky but there is a glimmer of hope.

You control the red balloon using standards WASD (or arrow keys).
"Space" or "F" activates a force push ability, which can come in clutch, but cooldown.
Also works with a controller.

The game was made in 48 hours by the following three:

  • noremac7777
  • Emanuil Tolev
  • Super Izzo
